tricks.name: Ollie
tricks.instruction: Push down on back, jump, and slide front foot forward.

tricks.name: Pop Shove it
tricks.instruction: Push down on back, scoop with rear foot as you jump, catch board with feet and land.

tricks.name: Frontside 180
tricks.instruction: Push down on back, jump and scoop the board to the front with rear foot, turn body with the board, catch with feet and land.

tricks.name: Backside 180
tricks.instruction: Push down on back, jump and scoop the board to the back with rear foot, turn body with the board, catch board with feet and land.

tricks.name: Kickflip
tricks.instruction: Push down on back, jump and flick with front leg ankle to 45 degrees, catch board with feet and land
